tags: hi yes i was feeling super sappy today
and also drabbles are really addicting to write
and i know that's the least original title ever for this but whatever
summary:
Salt & Pepper
Pepper loves the strands of grey starting to streak their way into Tony's dark hair. Tony wants to dye them away,...
body:
Salt & Pepper

Pepper loves the strands of grey starting to streak their way into Tony’s dark hair. Tony wants to dye them away, grumbling adorably about looking old.

It’s hard for Pepper to put into words how much she used to be scared he wouldn’t be here long enough for that, how much she loves watching him just live.

So she whispers other truths while tangling her fingers in the soft greying curls he’s finally letting grow out; hasn’t he noticed that she can’t keep her hands off him like this?

Tony grins at that, and he lets the grey come in.

So she whispers other truths while tangling her fingers in the soft greying curls he’s finally letting grow out; hasn’t he noticed that she can’t keep her hands off him like this?

blog.name: itismarvelicious
blog.title: Qu'est-ce que j'irais faire au paradis ?
blog.description: French. 25. | Fixing Avengers: Endgame here. | I take prompts. | Pepperony mainly.

summary: Need Tony to tell Pepper “everything will be okay” at the end of Endgame, as a parallel to Iron Man 3 when he tells her “(you’re...
body:
Need Tony to tell Pepper “everything will be okay” at the end of Endgame, as a parallel to Iron Man 3 when he tells her “(you’re in a relationship with me,) everything will never be okay.” This time everything will be okay. They’ll live that peaceful life at last.

Or, alternately, Tony, in a state of total depression at the end of Endgame, says “I don’t know if I’m ever gonna be okay”. And Pepper says with a smile: “Hey. You’re in a relationship with me, everything will be okay.” And the next scene is their wedding.

reblog.comment:

Marvel comic and movie verse fan works from AO3.
_____
ao3feedmonster@gmail.com

title: Blitzkrieg Bop
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2OZdR90

by Danesincry

After falling into the wrong universe at the end of Sunflower (Spider-Verse), Sorrel ends up in the MCU Spider-Man’s universe, but ten years prior. He meets Doctor Bruce Banner and heals his broken foot before he is zapped to the present time. Now he has to find a way home from this universe, and hope to God the Avengers don’t kill him for coming into the Tower in refuge. Did he mention he has NO idea who any of these people are either?

—–

Part two of my Deaf Spider: Into the Spider-Verses series. Sequel to Sunflower.

Sorrel, my Spidersona, is a deaf FtM character in high school. He was bitten by a spider and now he is Deaf Spider! You do NOT have to read the first one to understand everything, but it will make this story way easier to understand.

This will have a lot of Irondad and Spiderson in it, and a lot of shenanigans from the Avengers.

Words: 2136, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of Deaf Spider: Into The Spider-Verses

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse (2018), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M, Other
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Bruce Banner, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Tony Stark, Mary Jane Watson, Gwen Stacy, Michelle Jones, Ned Leeds, Avengers Team (MCU), Original Male Character(s), May Parker (Spider-Man)
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Bruce Banner & Original Male Character(s), Clint Barton & Natasha Romanov, Bruce Banner/Natasha Romanov, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Peter Parker & Original Male Character(s), Gwen Stacy & Original Male Character(s), Mary Jane Watson & Original Male Character(s), Michelle Jones & Ned Leeds & Peter Parker, Michelle Jones & Original Male Character(s)
  • Additional Tags: Spidersona, Bruce Banner Needs a Hug, Protective Bruce Banner, Protective Tony Stark, Deaf Character, Deaf Clint Barton, Trans Character, Trans Male Character, Peter is not Trans but the Spidersona is, Original Character(s), Sad with a Happy Ending, The Avengers Are Good Bros, Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker’s Parental Figure, Peter Parker Deserves Better, Bruce Banner Returns After Avengers: Age of Ultron, Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse (2018) Spoilers, Post-Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse (2018), Not Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie) Compliant, infinity war doesn’t happen, Thanos (Marvel) Dies, Deaf Spider, Irondad, spiderson, spideyson

blog.name: brendaonao3
blog.title: This Is My House, And My House Music
blog.description: Brenda | Los Angeles, CA Writer. Geek. Fangirl. (Not always in that order) My Ask Box is always open for fic prompts Return to Dashboard

summary: Comics Tony, Comics Maria, Steve Rogers
question: Comics Tony, Comics Maria, Steve Rogers
answer:
Ha, I should have figured this was coming :D

Steve Rogers

general opinion:  Actual Love Of My Life
hotness level: 10/10 would bang
hogwarts house: Gryffindor
best quality: His keen sense of justice
worst quality: Impulsiveness and Stubbornness
ship them with: Bucky and Thor and T’Challa and Nat and Maria and Clint and Bruce and Peggy and Rhodey and Carol and ANY of the Commandos and and and (there aren’t many people I don’t ship Steve with, lbr here)
brotp them with:  Fury and Wanda
needs to stay away from: Tony and General Ross
misc. thoughts: I will die loving this character


Comics!Maria Hill

general opinion:  They’re fine I guess
hotness level: Neutral
hogwarts house: Slytherin
best quality: Good intentions
worst quality: Her need to control every single thing 
ship them with: Clint and Steve (but only for the hate!sex)
brotp them with:  Natasha and Wanda and Jennifer Walters and Jessica Drew and Bobbi Morse
needs to stay away from: Bucky and Peter
misc. thoughts:  I love how complex she is, but she is the WORST director of SHIELD ever :D


Comics!Tony Stark

general opinion:  Fall in a hole and die
hotness level: Get away from me
hogwarts house: Slytherin
best quality: Um…yeah, I got nuthin’ - okay, if I’m forced to say something nice, I was happy he honored Steve’s wishes in giving Bucky the shield in Brubaker’s Cap run
worst quality: He’s the worst sort of condescending mansplaining dick who is willing to cross any line
ship them with: Pepper and Rhodey and Vision and Namor
brotp them with:  Riri Williams and Sam Wilson and Maria Hill
needs to stay away from: Reed Richards and T’Challa and Stever forever and ever and ever amen
misc. thoughts: I will never forgive him for the shit he pulled in Hickman’s Avengers run

For the send me a character meme!

worst quality: He’s the worst sort of condescending mansplaining dick who is willing to cross any line
ship them with: Pepper and Rhodey and Vision and Namor
brotp them with:  Riri Williams and Sam Wilson and Maria Hill
needs to stay away from: Reed Richards and T’Challa and Stever forever and ever and ever amen
misc. thoughts: I will never forgive him for the shit he pulled in Hickman’s Avengers run

For the send me a character meme!

trail.content_raw:
Ha, I should have figured this was coming :D

Steve Rogers

general opinion:  Actual Love Of My Life
hotness level: 10/10 would bang
hogwarts house: Gryffindor
best quality: His keen sense of justice
worst quality: Impulsiveness and Stubbornness
ship them with: Bucky and Thor and T’Challa and Nat and Maria and Clint and Bruce and Peggy and Rhodey and Carol and ANY of the Commandos and and and (there aren’t many people I don’t ship Steve with, lbr here)
brotp them with:  Fury and Wanda
needs to stay away from: Tony and General Ross
misc. thoughts: I will die loving this character


Comics!Maria Hill

general opinion:  They’re fine I guess
hotness level: Neutral
hogwarts house: Slytherin
best quality: Good intentions
worst quality: Her need to control every single thing 
ship them with: Clint and Steve (but only for the hate!sex)
brotp them with:  Natasha and Wanda and Jennifer Walters and Jessica Drew and Bobbi Morse
needs to stay away from: Bucky and Peter
misc. thoughts:  I love how complex she is, but she is the WORST director of SHIELD ever :D


Comics!Tony Stark

general opinion:  Fall in a hole and die
hotness level: Get away from me
hogwarts house: Slytherin
best quality: Um…yeah, I got nuthin’ - okay, if I’m forced to say something nice, I was happy he honored Steve’s wishes in giving Bucky the shield in Brubaker’s Cap run
worst quality: He’s the worst sort of condescending mansplaining dick who is willing to cross any line
ship them with: Pepper and Rhodey and Vision and Namor
brotp them with:  Riri Williams and Sam Wilson and Maria Hill
needs to stay away from: Reed Richards and T’Challa and Stever forever and ever and ever amen
misc. thoughts: I will never forgive him for the shit he pulled in Hickman’s Avengers run
